import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { BookOpen, Award, Clock, BarChart, BookMarked, Target, Zap, Trophy, Users, Star } from "lucide-react"; import { CourseProgressTracker } from "./CourseProgressTracker" // ... (keep the interface definitions as they are) export function Dashboard() { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); // eslint-disable-next-line no-unused-vars const [stats, setStats] = useState({ completedCourses: 5, totalHours: 120 }); const [enrollments, setEnrollments] = useState([]); const [achievements, setAchievements] = useState([]); const [recommendedCourses, setRecommendedCourses] = useState([]); const [courseProgress, setCourseProgress] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { // Fetch data and update state variables setLoading(false); }, []); if (loading) { return (
) } return (
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome back!

Ready to continue your learning journey?

{stats.streak} Day Streak!
{/* Stats Grid */}
{/* Main Content Grid */}
{/* Active Courses */}

Active Courses

{enrollments.map((enrollment) => (

{enrollment.course.title}

{enrollment.course.rating}
{enrollment.course.instructor}
Progress: {enrollment.progress}%
{enrollment.completed_lessons}/{enrollment.total_lessons} Lessons
))} {enrollments.length === 0 && (

No active courses

Start learning by enrolling in a course

)}
{/* Sidebar */}
{/* Achievements */}

Achievements

{achievements.map((achievement) => (

{achievement.title}

{achievement.description}

))}
{/* Recommended Courses */}

Recommended

{recommendedCourses.map((course) => (

{course.title}

{course.instructor}

{course.rating}
{course.duration}
))}
{/* Course Progress Tracker */}
) } function StatCard({ icon: Icon, title, value, color }) { return (

{title}

{value}

) }
